title: AmharicBERT: Transformer-based Language Model for Amharic
venue: Proceedings of the AfricaNLP Workshop, ICLR 2023
abstract: We present AmharicBERT, the first large-scale pretrained language model for Amharic, demonstrating state-of-the-art performance on various NLP tasks including text classification, named entity recognition, and question answering.

title: Machine Translation for Ethiopian Languages: Challenges and Opportunities
abstract: This paper surveys the current state of machine translation for Ethiopian languages, identifying key challenges related to data scarcity, linguistic diversity, and computational resources, while proposing practical solutions and research directions.
